title: Bronze mace

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Bronze mace is a mace made of bronze. It is the weakest mace in the game, and can be equipped at level 1 Attack. A bronze mace can be created at level 2 Smithing using 1 bronze bar. This item spawns in Sorceress' house in southern Al Kharid, and can be bought at Flynn's Mace Market in Falador.

Item ID1422

The Bronze mace is a mace made of bronze. It is the weakest mace in the game, and can be equipped at level 1 Attack. A bronze mace can be created at level 2 Smithing using 1 bronze bar. This item spawns in Sorceress' house in southern Al Kharid, and can be bought at Flynn's Mace Market in Falador.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
21 April 2021
(update)

The mace's attack speed has been decreased from 5 (every 3.0 seconds) to 4 (every 2.4 seconds).

[[File:Bronze mace detail.png|left|120px]]
The '''Bronze mace''' is a [[mace]] made of [[bronze equipment|bronze]]. It is the weakest mace in the game, and can be equipped at level 1 [[Attack]]. A bronze mace can be created at level 2 [[Smithing]] using 1 [[bronze bar]]. This item spawns in [[Sorceress]]' house in southern [[Al Kharid]], and can be bought at [[Flynn's Mace Market]] in [[Falador]].
